name: Rainco
wishText: 肖宇梁和宇航员天下第一好! ;)
textInChatBox: 祝你生日快乐！你一定要身体健康，平平安安ᓚᘏᗢ
text2: That's birthday card I was going to do.
text3: But I think it′s far from enough.
text4: I realized, I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are my honeybear,luckymoon.You are my everything.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
